## auth.EmailSignInProviderConfig interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface EmailSignInProviderConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [enabled](./firebase-admin.auth.emailsigninproviderconfig.enabled.md) | boolean | Whether email provider is enabled. |
|  [passwordRequired](./firebase-admin.auth.emailsigninproviderconfig.passwordrequired.md) | boolean | Whether password is required for email sign-in. When not required, email sign-in can be performed with password or via email link sign-in. |
